title: The Great Audit
body:
Verify data in the The Great Audit tool.
Resolve issues that came from The Great Audit tool.

- [x] MSBuild
- [x] CSProj
- [x] Install Scripts
- [x] PerfStar

nodes.body: Verified all the data in the tool, moved incorrectly assigned items to other teams, and deleted unused pipelines and repos.
